column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ dza ɔtsen wɔ EWURADZE enyiwa do
column3: dɛ mbrɛ n’egya Uzia yɛe no nyinara tse: naaso ɔannkɛhɛn EWURADZE n’asɔrdan no mu. Na ɔman no kɔr do bɔɔ ɔbrafun."

column2: "Ɔno na osii EWURADZE fi abotsen sor dze no
column3: na Ofel fasu no do so osii pii."

column2: "Nkyii so ɔkyekyeer nkurow wɔ Juda nkokodo nkurow mu
column3: na ɔtotoow aban dzendzen na aban atsentsen wɔ kwaa mu."

column2: "Ɔnoara na ɔnye Ammonmba hen no so koe
column3: na odzii hɔn do nyim. Na afe no ara mu na Ammonmba no maa no dwetɛ  talent   ɔha
column5: na atoko so mpemdu. Dɛmara na Ammonmba no dze brɛɛ no wɔ afe a otsia ebien na ebiasa no mu so."

column3: osiandɛ ɔhyehyɛɛ n’akwan wɔ EWURADZE ne Nyankopɔn enyim."

column2: "Afei Jotam no ho asɛm nkaa no na n’akodzi nyinara
column5: wɔakyerɛw no wɔ Israel na Juda ahemfo nwoma no mu."
